data.title: LaurieAnn Gibson From Making Of The Band...
data.meta_description: A multi-city casting tour begins this month with open auditions in four U.S.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

A multi-city casting tour begins this month with open auditions in four U.S. cities. Casting dates and locations include:

March 7-8: Houston, TX

March 13-14: Charlotte, NC

March 21-22: New York, NY

To submit an audition, please visit MTV.com for more information.

Fans will also have the opportunity to experience Making the Band vocal booths that will pop-up around each city ahead of the open casting auditions. The first vocal booth will appear in Atlanta and offer hopefuls a music video-style performance to approved audition songs. All submissions can be shared across social platforms and used to submit auditions online.

Sean Combs’ sons are best known for their careers spanning music, fashion and entertainment. Celebrity choreographer LaurieAnn Gibson returns to Making the Band as the franchise’s creative director.
